name: They.pl
description: THEY.PL is an advertising agency that specializes in planning and carrying out long-term digital campaigns. They offer end-to-end consulting, preparation, and implementation services for internet advertising campaigns in Poland and worldwide. Their clients include Avis, Accor Hotels, Black Red White, Bridgestone, Barlinek, Candy, Echo Investment, mBank, RTV Euro AGD, Roche, TubÄ…dzin, etc.
